json.name: Potion
json.description: Restores a small amount of health.

json.name: Mega Potion
json.description: Restores a moderate amount of health.

json.name: Max Potion
json.description: Fully restores health and maximizes the size of your Health Gauge.

json.name: Ancient Potion
json.description: Fully restores health and maximizes the size of your Health and Stamina Gauges.

json.name: Antidote
json.description: A cure for poison.

json.name: Herbal Medicine
json.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

json.name: Nulberry
json.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

json.name: Energy Drink
json.description: A Guild-approved beverage that boosts your stamina. Helps shake off sleep, too!

json.name: Ration
json.description: Food that restores a bit of stamina.

json.name: Rare Steak
json.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina. This one's still red in the middle.

json.name: Well-done Steak
json.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina and keeps it at max for a longer period. Meat done right!

json.name: Burnt Meat
json.description: Provides a small boost to your stamina. Can be eaten quickly.

json.name: Cool Drink
json.description: Provides temporary relief from extreme heat.

json.name: Nutrients
json.description: Very slightly increases your maximum health level.

json.name: Mega Nutrients
json.description: Slightly increases your maximum health level.

json.name: Immunizer
json.description: Boosts your natural ability to heal.

json.name: Astera Jerky
json.description: Juicy, dried meat made by Astera's chef. Boosts natural healing and cures bleeding.

json.name: Dash Juice
json.description: Dulls one's sense of exhaustion. Reduces stamina depletion for a time.

json.name: Might Seed
json.description: Temporarily strengthens your attacks when ingested by improving energy flow.

json.name: Demondrug
json.description: Boosts your attack power by filling you with - guess what? - demonic strength.

json.name: Mega Demondrug
json.description: Boosts your attack power even more than a regular Demondrug.

json.name: Might Pill
json.description: Temporarily endows you with the strength of a mighty god. Potent!

json.name: Adamant Seed
json.description: Temporarily raises your defense when ingested by hardening tissue.

json.name: Armorskin
json.description: Boosts your defense by turning your skin as hard as rock.

json.name: Mega Armorskin
json.description: Boosts your defense even more than a regular armorskin.

json.name: Adamant Pill
json.description: Temporarily makes your skin as hard as adamant. Potent!

json.name: Lifepowder
json.description: Produces a healing cloud in the area around the user.

json.name: Herbal Powder
json.description: A mysterious powder that produces a cloud around the area that restores health and neutralizes poison.

json.name: Demon Powder
json.description: A mysterious powder that produces a cloud around the area that temporarily strengthens attacks.

json.name: Hardshell Powder
json.description: A mysterious powder that produces a cloud around the area that temporarily strengthens defense.

json.name: Honey
json.description: Highly nutritious honey. Combine this with Potions to craft Mega Potions for maximum potency.

json.name: Herb
json.description: A primary ingredient in potions.

json.name: Antidote Herb
json.description: A primary ingredient in antidotes.

json.name: Fire Herb
json.description: A wondrous, flammable plant. Useful for crafting explosives.

json.name: Flowfern
json.description: This plant's leaves store a great amount of water. A component for making Water Ammo.

json.name: Snow Herb
json.description: A plant that radiates ice-cold air. Use in combinations to create freeze ammo.

json.name: Sleep Herb
json.description: A plant containing sleeping agents. Used to craft tranquilizers.

json.name: Ivy
json.description: A lightweight and extremely strong plant. Used to make nets for pitfall traps.

json.name: Smokenut
json.description: A nut that produces a copious amount of smoke. Combine with other items to create smoke with various properties.

json.name: Dragonfell Berry
json.description: A mysterious berry, rumored for eons to be loathed by dragons. Required to craft Dragon Ammo.

json.name: Blue Mushroom
json.description: A mushroom infused with power-enhancing effects. Used in restorative items.

json.name: Mandragora
json.description: A dangerous fungus said to draw the life out of people. Beware. Required to craft Max Potions.

json.name: Nitroshroom
json.description: A hard-to-find mushroom with the power to generate blazing heat. Required to craft Gunpowder.

json.name: Devil's Blight
json.description: A very rare fungus that pulses with extreme heat. Add to a barrel bomb for a dramatically stronger blast.

json.name: Parashroom
json.description: A mushroom that induces paralysis. Required to craft Tranq Bombs.

json.name: Toadstool
json.description: A poisonous fungus. Can be used as a toxin for knives.

json.name: Exciteshroom
json.description: This one has a very strange aroma. Is it edible? Only one way to find out! Required to craft Farcasters.

json.name: Chillshroom
json.description: This mushroom is a primary ingredient in cool drinks.

json.name: Bitterbug
json.description: A sharp-tasting bug with innate healing abilities. Used as an ingredient in many medicines.

json.name: Flashbug
json.description: An insect that emits a powerful flash when it dies. Required to craft Flash Pods.

json.name: Godbug
json.description: An insect said to live a millennium. Combine it with other items to add their properties to the powder.

json.name: Thunderbug
json.description: An insect that emits electricity when struck. Required to craft Shock Traps and Thunder Ammo.

json.name: Baitbug
json.description: An insect used as fishing bait. A fish favorite, it practically races down the nearest gilly gullet.

json.name: Kelbi Horn
json.description: While not practical for forging purposes, Kelbi horns are a vital component of many items.

json.name: Dash Extract
json.description: A mysterious substance culled from certain monsters that increases endurance.

json.name: Nourishing Extract
json.description: Can be obtained from certain large monsters. Has the ability to amplify the effects of certain medicines.

json.name: Screamer Sac
json.description: A monster organ that emits an earsplitting sonic blast when ruptured. Used to craft screamer pods.

json.name: Catalyst
json.description: Works with other materials to enhance their effects. Cannot be used by itself.

json.name: Tranq Bomb
json.description: A hand grenade used to capture monsters ensnared in traps. Can be slammed against the ground.

json.name: Flash Pod
json.description: Slinger ammo that flashes brightly on impact. Fire it right under a monster's nose to blind it.

json.name: Screamer Pod
json.description: Used as ammo for your slinger. Emits a harsh, high-frequency sound that can disrupt sensitive monsters.

json.name: Dung Pod
json.description: Slinger ammo that releases a strong odor on impact. Causes certain monsters to flee.

json.name: Smoke Bomb
json.description: Creates a large cloud of smoke wherever it lands.

json.name: Poison Smoke Bomb
json.description: Releases a toxic cloud of mist when used. Also popular as a household bug bomb.

json.name: Farcaster
json.description: Call for a wingdrake to transport you to the nearest camp. Can also be used during battles.

json.name: Raw Meat
json.description: Meat carved from a monster. Can be cooked, combined, or used to set a trap.

json.name: Poisoned Meat
json.description: Raw meat that poisons whatever eats it. Makes great bait for traps.

json.name: Tinged Meat
json.description: Raw meat that paralyzes whatever eats it. Makes great bait for traps.

json.name: Drugged Meat
json.description: Raw meat that puts whatever eats it to sleep. Makes great bait for traps.

json.name: Gunpowder
json.description: A dangerous substance that explodes when struct or heated.

json.name: Small Barrel
json.description: A small, empty barrel.

json.name: Barrel Bomb
json.description: A small time bomb.

json.name: Bounce Bomb
json.description: Launches into the air when set. This modified bomb requires skill to use.

json.name: Mega Bounce Bomb
json.description: An improved version of the bounce bomb. Requires some skill to use.

json.name: Large Barrel
json.description: A large, empty barrel. Combine with gunpowder to make it into a bomb.

json.name: Large Barrel Bomb
json.description: A powerful bomb triggered by external physical impact.

json.name: Mega Barrel Bomb
json.description: An upgraded large barrel bomb. Effective against large monsters.

json.name: Spider Web
json.description: A very sticky web. Used to craft pitfall traps.

json.name: Net
json.description: A sturdy net that supports a certain amount of weight without breaking. Perfect for pitfall traps.

json.name: Trap Tool
json.description: A must-have item for putting together pitfall traps and other kinds of traps.

json.name: Pitfall Trap
json.description: A trap for catching certain large monsters. It is tripped by a heavy weight.

json.name: Shock Trap
json.description: A trap that immobilizes a target. Use it to capture monsters.

json.name: Rolled-up Dung
json.description: A ball of condensed monster dung. Used to make dung pods for your slinger.

json.name: Dung
json.description: Exudes a prodigious smell. Used to make ammo for your slinger called dung pods.

json.name: Arowana Bait
json.description: A ball of bait favored by fish of the Arowana family.

json.name: Gunpowderfish Bait
json.description: A ball of bait favored by fish of the Gunpowderfish family.

json.name: Goldenfish Bait
json.description: A ball of bait favored by fish of the Goldenfish family.

json.name: Boomerang
json.description: An unusually-shaped weapon from abroad that returns to its user when thrown.

json.name: Binoculars
json.description: Allows you to see farther and observe from a distance.

json.name: Powercharm
json.description: An amulet that strengthens attacks. Just carrying this gives you demonic strength.

json.name: Powertalon
json.description: A charm that strengthens attacks. Its effects are amplified by the dragon parts it contains.

json.name: Armorcharm
json.description: An amulet that increases defense. Just carrying this hardens your skin like stone.

json.name: Armortalon
json.description: A charm that increases defense. Its effects are amplified by the dragon parts it contains.

json.name: Needleberry
json.description: A nut covered in needle-like spines. Used to make spread ammo.

json.name: Blastnut
json.description: A nut used to make sticky ammo.

json.name: Dragonstrike Nut
json.description: A nut that explodes on impact. Used to make wyvern ammo.

json.name: Slashberry
json.description: Used to make slicing ammo.

json.name: Latchberry
json.description: A nut that bears a spiral groove. Used to make pierce ammo.

json.name: Bomberry
json.description: A nut that ruptures on impact. Used to make cluster bombs.

json.name: Flamenut
json.description: Used to make gunpowder that increases ammo firepower.

json.name: Blazenut
json.description: Used to make gunpowder that greatly increases ammo firepower.

json.name: Gunpowder Level 2
json.description: Combustible powser. Combine with level 1 ammo to raise its level.

json.name: Whetfish Fin
json.description: A fish fin used to sharpen weapons. Restores sharpness greatly, but good for fewer uses than a whetstone.

json.name: Whetfish Fin+
json.description: A fish fin used to sharpen weapons. Works better than a whetstone, and can be reused if you're lucky.

json.name: Sushifish Scale
json.description: A scale from a Sushifish. Eat to restore a small amount of health. Also works to treat bleeding.

json.name: Great Sushifish Scale
json.description: Scale from a Great Sushifish. Eat to get large health boost, a natural healing boost, and treat bleeding.

json.name: Gunpowderfish Scale
json.description: The scales of a Gunpowderfish. Combine with a large barrel bomb to dramatically increase its firepower.

json.name: Great Gunpowderfish Scale
json.description: The scales of a Great Gunpowderfish. Combine with a large barrel bomb to make a mega barrel bomb.

json.name: Burst Arowana Scale
json.description: The scales of a Burst Arowana. Combine with fire herb to make a large amount of level 2 gunpowder.

json.name: Great Burst Arowana Scale
json.description: The scales of a Great Burst Arowana. Combine with fire herb to make a vast amount of level 2 gunpowder.

json.name: Bomb Arowana Scale
json.description: The scales of a Bomb Arowana. Combine with fire herb to make a large amount of Lv3 gunpowder.

json.name: Great Bomb Arowana Scale
json.description: The scales of a Great Bomb Arowana. Combine with fire herb to make a vast amount of Lv3 gunpowder.

json.name: Empty Phial
json.description: A regularly old empty phial. Nothing more, nothing less.

json.name: Iron Ore
json.description: Ore that can be smelted into metal and used for many different purposes.

json.name: Machalite Ore
json.description: Ore that's more difficult to procure than Iron Ore. Produces fine metal.

json.name: Dragonite Ore
json.description: An ore that yields metal superior to that of Machalite. Invaluable for making durable armor.

json.name: Carbalite Ore
json.description: Ore obtained from mining outcrops. Still under research, but known to yield highly pure metal.

json.name: Fucium Ore
json.description: Ore obtained from the Elder's Recess. A mysterious metal, capable of fusing nearly any two materials together.

json.name: Earth Crystal
json.description: Crystallized microbes prized as an abrasive when forging weapons. Mainly found in the Wildspire Waste.

json.name: Coral Crystal - Rarity 4
json.description: Crystal prized at the Smithy for use in high-grade abrasives. Mainly found in the Coral Highlands.

json.name: Dragonvein Crystal
json.description: Mined from high rank areas. Many expect this newly-discovered crystal to usher in a new era of metalwork.

json.name: Lightcrystal
json.description: A precious and extremely hard substance with a faint glow. Sometimes used for crafting tools.

json.name: Novacrystal
json.description: High quality Lightcrystal. Highly coveted for its rarity, it's used for only the finest of metalworking.

json.name: Firecell Stone
json.description: A magma-like deposit that only trained hands can work with. Armor made from it is first-class.

json.name: Aquacore Ore
json.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Gives off a vibrant glow that mirrors the ocean.

json.name: Spiritcore Ore
json.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Gives off a warm, sunny glow.

json.name: Dreamcore Ore
json.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Gives off a blazing glow reminiscent of a bonfire.

json.name: Dragoncore Ore
json.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Gives off a mysterious glow that grants the holder sagely wisdom.

json.name: Armor Sphere
json.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it by a tiny amount.

json.name: Armor Sphere+
json.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it by a small amount.

json.name: Advanced Armor Sphere
json.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it.

json.name: Hard Armor Sphere
json.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to significantly improve it.

json.name: Heavy Armor Sphere
json.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to greatly improve it.

json.name: Sturdy Bone
json.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Coral Highlands and Rotten Vale.

json.name: Quality Bone
json.description: A bone used as crafting material. Its ease of use and hardness allow it to be shaped into better gear.

json.name: Ancient Bone
json.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Ancient Forest. Its size evokes a certain primal quality.

json.name: Boulder Bone
json.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Wildspire Waste. Its size evokes a certain primal quality.

json.name: Coral Bone
json.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Coral Highlands. Its size evokes a certain primal quality.

json.name: Warped Bone
json.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Rotten Vale. Its size evokes a certain primal quality.

json.name: Brutal Bone
json.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Elder's Recess. Its size evokes a certain primal quality.

json.name: Dragonbone Relic
json.description: A high quality material found in bone piles. The only remains left of a species of dragon now lost to time.

json.name: Unknown Skull
json.description: A rare material found in bonepiles in the Elder's Recess. It appears to be some kind of animal skull.

json.name: Great Hornfly
json.description: Discovered by Botanical Research. An insect with a giant horn, massive shell, and butterfly-like wings.

json.name: Sinister Cloth
json.description: Suspect cloth the Tailraider Safari dug up from who-knows-where. Drips with an aura of pure evil.

json.name: Monster Bone S
json.description: A material found in bonepiles. Indispensable for both hunting and daily life.

json.name: Monster Bone M
json.description: Bone obtained from large monsters. Strong yet flexible, it's as reliable as steel or wood.

json.name: Monster Bone L
json.description: Bone obtained from large monsters. Hard to work with due to its size, but vital when crafting larger items.

json.name: Monster Bone+
json.description: Bone obtained from large monsters. Hard to obtain, but vital for crafting powerful equipment.

json.name: Monster Keenbone
json.description: Bone obtained from high rank large monsters. It has a razor-sharp tip that retains its strength after forging.

json.name: Monster Hardbone
json.description: Precious bone obtained from high rank large monsters. Their rarity makes them highly sought after.

json.name: Elder Dragon Bone
json.description: A bone from an elder dragon. It exudes the great majesty of the beast that bore it.

json.name: Sharp Claw
json.description: Obtained from small fanged wyverns. Unlike wyvern claws, this is shaped to grip objects.

json.name: Piercing Claw
json.description: Material from high rank small fanged wyverns. Sharp enough that it might serve as a makeshift knife.

json.name: Monster Fluid
json.description: Material obtained from small insects. Mixes with insect gastric fluids to form adhesive.

json.name: Monster Broth
json.description: Material from high rank insects. A rich broth made from only the thickest of monster juices.

json.name: Poison Sac
json.description: A monster organ that contains a lethal toxin. Handle with extreme care.

json.name: Toxin Sac
json.description: A monster organ filled with an extremely potent toxin. Just touching it is dangerous.

json.name: Paralysis Sac
json.description: A monster organ that contains paralyzing neurotoxins.

json.name: Omniplegia Sac
json.description: A monster organ filled with potent neurotoxins. A single touch can cause paralysis.

json.name: Sleep Sac
json.description: A monster organ that contains a knockout powder capable of inducing sleep.

json.name: Coma Sac
json.description: A monster organ that contains dangerous powder. One whiff can induce a coma.

json.name: Flame Sac
json.description: A monster organ filled with flammable powder. Handle with extreme care.

json.name: Inferno Sac
json.description: A monster organ filled with powder that ignites if it so much as touches air. Danger!

json.name: Aqua Sac
json.description: A monster organ designed to hold and preserve water.

json.name: Torrent Sac
json.description: A monster organ designed to hold and preserve copious amounts of water.

json.name: Frost Sac
json.description: A monster internal organ, filled with extremely low temperature fluid. Handle with care.

json.name: Freezer Sac
json.description: A monster organ with tremendous freezing power. Turns its surroundings to ice.

json.name: Electro Sac
json.description: A monster organ that can store up electricity, which is released on impact.

json.name: Thunder Sac
json.description: A monster organ that can store up large amounts of high voltage electricity.

json.name: Bird Wyvern Gem
json.description: A valuable gem that can be harvested from bird wyverns. Said to fetch a high price on the market.

json.name: Wyvern Gem
json.description: Throughout a wyvern's life, impurities gather and form this peculiar gem.

json.name: Elder Dragon Blood
json.description: Contains an unknown compound. The object of much scholarly research.

json.name: Mosswine Hide
json.description: A musty hide covered in moss.

json.name: Warm Pelt
json.description: A pelt from a small animal. Used for many things, but mostly just regular clothes.

json.name: High-quality Pelt
json.description: Rare pelt from a small animal. Feels wonderful to the touch and valued highly by the Commission.

json.name: Vespoid Shell
json.description: Vespoid material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

json.name: Vespoid Carapace
json.description: Rare Vespoid material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

json.name: Vespoid Wing
json.description: Vespoid material. Obtained by carving. Light and sharp, used in many weapons.

json.name: Vespoid Innerwing
json.description: Rare Vespoid material. Obtained by carving. Light and sharp, used in many weapons.

json.name: Hornetaur Shell
json.description: Hornetaur material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

json.name: Hornetaur Wing
json.description: Hornetaur material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

json.name: Hornetaur Head
json.description: Hornetaur material. Obtained by carving. Unusual, used in select gear.

json.name: Hornetaur Carapace
json.description: Rare Hornetaur material. Obtained by carving. Used for many purposes.

json.name: Hornetaur Innerwing
json.description: Rare Hornetaur material. Obtained by carving. Light and sharp, used in many weapons.

json.name: Gajau Skin
json.description: Gajau material. Obtained by carving. Water-resistant, used to craft gear.

json.name: Gajau Whisker
json.description: Gajau material. Obtained by carving. Hardy, used to craft gear.

json.name: Gajau Scale
json.description: Rare Gajau material. Obtained by carving. Water-resistant, used to craft gear.

json.name: Grand Gajau Whisker
json.description: Rare Gajau material. Obtained by carving. Hardy, used to craft gear.

json.name: Wingdrake Hide
json.description: A material carved from wingdrakes. Lightweight and often used when crafting armor.

json.name: Wingdrake Hide+
json.description: A rare material carved from wingdrakes. Lightweight and often used when crafting armor.

json.name: Barnos Hide+
json.description: Rare Barnos material. Obtained by carving. Supple, used to craft gear.

json.name: Barnos Talon
json.description: Rare Barnos material. Obtained by carving. Unusual, used in select gear.

json.name: Kestodon Shell
json.description: Kestodon material. Obtained by carving. Sturdy, used to craft gear.

json.name: Kestodon Scalp
json.description: Kestodon material. Obtained by carving. Unusual, used in select gear.

json.name: Kestodon Carapace
json.description: Superior Kestodon material. Obtained by carving. Sturdy, used to craft gear.

json.name: Gastodon Carapace
json.description: Rare Gastodon material. Obtained by carving. Sturdy, used to craft gear.

json.name: Gastodon Horn
json.description: Rare Gastodon material. Obtained by carving. Unusual, used in select gear.

json.name: Jagras Scale

json.description: Proof of defeating a leshen. In another world, hunters hang this from their horse saddle to show off.

json.name: Mega Man Ticket
json.description: A ticket for a special Mega Man tie-in. Gives you access to special 8-bit retro Palico equipment.

json.name: SFV Ticket II
json.description: A Street Fighter V collaboration ticket. Wait, that female fighter is also going to hunt monsters!?

json.name: SFV Ticket III
json.description: A Street Fighter V collaboration ticket. Has that legendary world warrior leveled up his game!?

json.name: Appreciation Ticket
json.description: A ticket you receive for attending the Appreciation Fest. Can be exchanged for special equipment or fireworks.

json.name: Autumn Harvest Ticket
json.description: A ticket you receive for attending the Autumn Harvest Fest. Can be exchanged for special equipment or fireworks.

json.name: Beetle Ticket
json.description: A ticket with the heroic black ruler drawn on it. Redeem at the Resource Center for something nice?!

json.name: Bristly Crake Ticket
json.description: A ticket with the heroic black ruler drawn on it. Redeem at the Resource Center for something nice?!

json.name: Bushi Ticket
json.description: A voucher given to those who assisted in the special investigation. Be sure to show it to the resource center.

json.name: Downy Crake Ticket
json.description: A ticket with a pair of Downy Crakes drawn on it. Redeem at the Smithy for something nice!?

json.name: Faux Ticket
json.description: A ticket with a Mosswine and Felyne drawn on it. Redeem at the Resource Center for something nice!?

json.name: Faux Ticket II
json.description: A ticket with a Wiggler and eyepatch drawn on it. Redeem at the Resource Center for something nice!?

json.name: Faux Ticket III
json.description: A ticket with Kulu-Ya-Ku drawn on it. Redeem at the Resource Center for something nice!?

json.name: Summer Insect Field Guide
json.description: A field guide containing new info about Great Hornflies. Show it to the smithy for a ... novel armor set.

json.name: Summer Twilight Ticket
json.description: A ticket you receive for attending the Summer Twilight Fest. Can be exchanged for special equipment or firework.

json.name: Winter Star Ticket
json.description: A ticket you receive for attending the Winter Star Fest. Can be exchanged for special equipment or fireworks.

json.name: Pierce Ammo 2
json.description: High-grade armor-piercing ammo. Deals more hits than Pierce Ammo 1.

json.name: Twilight Fireworks
json.description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Summer Twilight Fest. Enjoy the summer heat with a bang!

json.name: Harvest Fireworks
json.description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Autumn Harvest Fest. Dance till the ground lights up in a blaze!

json.name: Star Fireworks
json.description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Winter Star Fest. Enjoy the festivities with a bang!

json.name: Appreciation Fireworks
json.description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Appreciation Fest. Show your thanks by lighting these fireworks!

json.name: Fulgurbug
json.description: Very rare Zinogre material, obtained with capture net while it's toppled. Compatible with thunder element.

json.name: Gloamgrass Bud
json.description: A plant with healing properties. Combine it with a Godbug to bring out its full potency.

json.name: Shadowcore Ore
json.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Its shine somehow saps the light away from its surroundings.

json.name: Phantomcore Ore
json.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Its otherworldy shimmering speaks to the power it contains.

json.name: Purecrystal
json.description: Very rare lightcrystal. Used by the forge workers to craft their tools due to its incredible hardness.

json.name: Bathycite Ore
json.description: Ore from Coral Highlands. Formed by millennia of pressure acting upon the bones of ancient organisms.

json.name: Gracium
json.description: Ore from the Hoarfrost Reach. When the light catches this rare and useful metal it takes on a pale blue shine.

json.name: Meldspar Ore
json.description: Ore often found in the Rotten Vale. Malleable but strong, it is broadly used in creating alloys for crafting.

json.name: Spiritvein Crystal
json.description: Mined from master rank areas. Little is known about these crystals save the complexity of their balance.

json.name: Dragonvein Coal
json.description: Special coal that contains the earth's energy within. Prized as fuel at the Commission's new base.

json.name: Dragonvein Shard
json.description: The leavings of special coal that contains the earth's energy within. Even these scrapes make fine fuel.

json.name: Dragonbone Artifact
json.description: A very rare bone from bonepiles. Evidence of an unknown elder dragon that once ruled the land.

json.name: Monster Slogbone
json.description: Bone obtained from large master rank monsters. Far heavier than its outward appearance would suggest.

json.name: Monster Solidbone
json.description: Bone obtained from large master rank monsters. Sturdy enough to withstand even the most ferocious of impacts.

json.name: Conflagrant Sac
json.description: A monster organ that contains highly volatile and extremely explosive powder. Exquisitely dangerous.

json.name: Cryo Sac
json.description: A monster organ that contains a potent freezing agent. Able to cover a broad area in ice instantaneously.

json.name: Deadly Poison Sac
json.description: A monster organ that contains an extremely virulent toxin. Handle with extreme care.

json.name: Flood Sac
json.description: A monster organ designed to hold and preserve tremendous amounts of water.

json.name: Frozen Bone
json.description: A bone found in bonepiles in the Hoarfrost Reach. Tempered by years of the tundra's unrelenting cold.

json.name: Large Wyvern Gem
json.description: A wyvern gem that has grown further over the ages. Emits a mesmerizing shimmer.

json.name: Lightning Sac
json.description: A monster organ that can store electricity as strong as lightning. It rumbles like thunder.

json.name: Monster Toughbone
json.description: Bone obtained from large master rank monsters. It emits a potent aura of near-limitless potential.

json.name: Thick Bone

json.name: Torpor Sac
json.description: A monster organ that contains a sleeping agent capable of instantly knocking out even a raging monster.

json.name: Ultraplegia Sac
json.description: A monster organ filled with highly concentrated neurotoxins. Handle with extreme care.

json.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to extremely improve it.
